item.title: US Secret Service Director Admits "Complacency" At July Trump Rally
item.description: The US Secret Service on Friday detailed a litany of failures uncovered by its review of the attempted assassination of former president Donald Trump at a rally in July.

item.title: Quad May Announce Expansion Of Maritime Pact To Indian Ocean: White House
item.description: The QUAD summit has plans to expand the Indo-Pacific Partnership for Maritime Domain Awareness initiative from South East Asia to the Indian Ocean Region, the White House said Friday.

item.title: Kamala Harris holds rally in swing state Wisconsin and says ‘we’re the underdog in this race’ – live
item.description:
Earlier today, vice-president highlighted case of Amber Thurman, who died in Georgia due to strict abortion ban

Kamala Harris will be in Georgia today and is expected to speak about Donald Trump’s role in the abortion bans that now blanket much of the United States, days after news broke that two Georgia mothers died after being unable to access legal abortions and adequate medical care.

The deaths of the Georgia mothers, Amber Nicole Thurman and Candi Miller, were first reported earlier this week by ProPublica and occurred as a result of Georgia enacting a six-week abortion ban. Georgia’s maternal mortality review committee looked at both women’s cases and deemed their deaths “preventable”, according to ProPublica.

You’re looking at a mother that is broken, the worst pain ever that a mother, that a parent can ever feel.

Continue reading...

item.title: Georgia's abortion ban killed a young mother. The Christian right now blames the victim
Putin ally warns West of nuclear war over Ukraine
